messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unity
messages.msgSnippet: I just want to say that we attend Unity from time to time and I think it is wonderful as they are very accepting of diverse beliefs.  But what I (and my ds)
messages.messageBody:
I just want to say that we attend Unity from time to time and I think it is wonderful as they are very accepting of diverse beliefs. But what I (and my ds) like best about it is that at every service they sing "Let there be Peace on Earth." I just LOVE this and always get all tingly that so many folks are praying for peace. Will says this is his favorite song and I agree. Also, the "readings" aren't usually from the bible, but rather Gandhi, or Paramahansa Yogananda or some other great sage.
Millie
PS Oh yeah, they sing the song differently than I heard it growing up: "With God as Creator, Family all are we...."
